response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to us at $1,500,000. Considering its worth and the potential it can bring to you, I would like to extend an exclusive offer. We are willing to sell this product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a significant discount, aimed at ensuring you benefit from the product's full potential without compromising on the quality and value. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss this further with you.", "product_price": 1200000}
